headline.print_headline: Secret Service Agents Reassigned After Incidents
headline.main: Secret Service Agents Reassigned After Incidents

docs.snippet: The Secret Service has reassigned agents from its special operations division, including the top agent there, after a pair of embarrassing incidents earlier this year....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Secret Service has reassigned agents from its special operations division, including the top agent there, after a pair of embarrassing incidents earlier this year.

headline.print_headline: GM Auto Workers Vote to Allow Strike in Kentucky
headline.main: GM Auto Workers Vote to Allow Strike in Kentucky

docs.snippet: Workers at the General Motors plant in Kentucky that assembles Corvettes voted Tuesday to authorize a strike over lingering safety concerns, but a local union leader said he hopes the differences can be resolved without a walkout....
docs.lead_paragraph: Workers at the General Motors plant in Kentucky that assembles Corvettes voted Tuesday to authorize a strike over lingering safety concerns, but a local union leader said he hopes the differences can be resolved without a walkout.

headline.print_headline: Broadcaster's Jailed Son Accused of Hitting Inmate
headline.main: Broadcaster's Jailed Son Accused of Hitting Inmate

docs.snippet: A criminal complaint against the jailed son of a Boston Red Sox broadcaster says he threw hot coffee in a fellow inmate's face, hit him with a plastic chair and punched him....
docs.lead_paragraph: A criminal complaint against the jailed son of a Boston Red Sox broadcaster says he threw hot coffee in a fellow inmate's face, hit him with a plastic chair and punched him.

headline.print_headline: Ted Kennedy Jr. Announces Run for Connecticut State Senate Seat
headline.main: Ted Kennedy Jr. Announces Run for Connecticut State Senate Seat

docs.snippet: Ted Kennedy Jr., son of the late Democratic senator from Massachusetts, Edward Kennedy, announced on Tuesday that he would run for a seat in the Connecticut state senate, his first run for political office....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ted Kennedy Jr., son of the late Democratic senator from Massachusetts, Edward Kennedy, announced on Tuesday that he would run for a seat in the Connecticut state senate, his first run for political office.

docs.snippet: At Redwood National and State Parks, thieves have been stealing burls, protrusions on trees that are prized for their intricately patterned wood....
docs.lead_paragraph: At Redwood National and State Parks, thieves have been stealing burls, protrusions on trees that are prized for their intricately patterned wood.

headline.print_headline: Barge Capsizes on Mississippi River; 2 Missing
headline.main: Barge Capsizes on Mississippi River; 2 Missing

docs.snippet: A Mississippi River barge overturned while unloading steel coils in northeast Arkansas on Tuesday, and authorities were searching for two people who fell into the water and went missing....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Mississippi River barge overturned while unloading steel coils in northeast Arkansas on Tuesday, and authorities were searching for two people who fell into the water and went missing.

headline.print_headline: Security Flaw Stresses Need to Change Passwords
headline.main: Heartbleed Security Flaw Emphasizes the Need to Change Passwords

docs.snippet: Immediately changing passwords after a security breach could feed a new password into a website that has not fixed the flaw, a security consultant said....
docs.abstract: Immediately changing passwords after a security breach could feed a new password into a website that has not fixed the flaw, a security consultant said.

docs.snippet: A late entrant into China's booming car market, Ford Motor's joint venture is now enjoying surging sales while regulators ponder different rules for international automakers....
docs.lead_paragraph: A late entrant into China's booming car market, Ford Motor's joint venture is now enjoying surging sales while regulators ponder different rules for international automakers.
